summary: Modder's resource with 4 different pillars and 1 obelisk ready to use in your mods.
descriptionHtml:
File includes 4 pillars and 1 obelisk which I have converted to .nif format and made ready to use in your mods.


Diffuse textures and normals included.
Default size can be seen in the image.
All the pillars have collision.
Very nice and easy to re-texture for any of your needs and can therefore be used with almost any tileset.


The source of these models and textures can be found [url=https://yughues.deviantart.com/art/Free-Pillars-01-268155242]here[/url]﻿.
They are released under [url=http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/]Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 License[/url]

Created by the wonderful [url=https://yughues.deviantart.com/]Yughues[/url] who has created a large number of free models and textures.
author: Incaendo
